Additional Works/Variations
Any additional works/variations shall be executed on written instructions. The same shall be carried out on mutually agreed rates. Payments for such works shall be made in interim bills. For Fillers more than 10cm be additional on variation cost.
Warranty
1 Year Warranty from the date of Final Hand-over of Sai Kitchen and Wooden Safes Factory.
Warranty Terms Conditions: This Warranty is not applied in the case of any damage, scratches, and dents, etc. if the products exposed to stocks using improper home detergents and other chimicals.
Any Damage cause by another contractor is not covered under warranty
Payment Terms
Delivery Terms
In the absence of the agreement to the contrary, the period of delivery begins at the latest of the following Comments:
a.) date of the order confirmation
b.) Date of fulfilment of all technical, commercial, and financial requirements on the part of the buyer
c.) The date on which we received the down payment
d.) The date on which we received Project Time Ligne
Exclusin
Sai Kitchen And Wardrobe work program at site does not include any plumbing, electric work associated with Kitchen Cabinets & Wardrobes installation.
Validity
This quotation prices are valid for 1 week only from the date of issuing.
